creator: Darin_Swanson@us.ibm.com
text:
With the change to Path.systemClasspath to final, this is a breaking change for 
the current Ant integration within Eclipse.

By default, Eclipse runs Ant within the same VM as Eclipse.
Therefore forcing the systemClasspath to be System.getProperty
("java.class.path") does not work for us.

We used to set the systemClasspath before each build to the correct value for 
our integration.
We can no longer do this with the designation of the variable as final.

Thanks.

Fixed in CVS by Conor.

Darin, are you subscribed to dev@ant?  We are changing a bunch of things for
the default classloader hierarchy Ant uses and even have a <classloader> task
in current CVS (undocumented and not agreed upon, yet) that may have bigger
impacts on IDE integration.

I had no idea that anybody might want to play with Ant's idea of the system
classpath, so I guess you are doing a couple of things that may get broken by us
without knowing that we do.
